replies.body: represent the highest standards ... cough tainted minds cough
Half of OPL starting roster suspended while Tainted Minds gets off with a slap on the wrist for severely mistreating players. Riot OCE is an utter joke.

Patch 8.1 was a joke also, and Patch 8.2 will be even worse!

Time to start selling off your accounts before they become worthless {{summoner:6}}
